front.title: Architectural Commentary on Site Multi-homing using a Level 3 Shim

abstract.t: This document provides an architectural description of the level 3 shim approach to site Multi-homing in IPv6 as described in [ID.SHIM6], [ID.REFER], [ID.FUNC], and [ID.HBA], using as a framework for this analysis the approach described in [ID.ARCH].
